alert.note: Alert for City of Hyder (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 01 at 3:43AM AKST until February 02 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW EXPECTED FOR THE MISTY FJORDS AREA... .Another front will bring another round of precipitation tonight. A secondary surge of moisture will move in Thursday. Boundary layer temperatures continue to support snow through late Thursday night. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 9 to 12 inches. * WHERE...City of Hyder. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 9 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall will become heavier and difficult to manage Thursday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
